tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBP Do) (RB n't) (VP (VB allow) (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS emotions)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB control) (NP (PRP you)) (SBAR (IN unless) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBP are) (NP (NP (NNS feelings)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP God)))))))))))) (. .)))
